SourceProxy.name: PythonCalculator
SourceProxy.label: Python Calculator

Documentation.long_help: This filter evaluates a Python expression

SourceProxy.Documentation:
This filter uses Python to calculate an expression. It depends heavily on the numpy and paraview.vtk modules. To use the parallel functions, mpi4py is also necessary. The expression is evaluated and the resulting scalar value or numpy array is added to the output as an array. See numpy and paraview.vtk documentation for the list of available functions.
This filter tries to make it easy for the user to write expressions by defining certain variables. The filter tries to assign each array to a variable of the same name. If the name of the array is not a valid Python variable, it has to be accessed through a dictionary called arrays (i.e. arrays['array_name']). The points can be accessed using the points variable.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input of the filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Expression
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The Python expression evaluated during execution.

IntVectorProperty.name: ArrayAssociation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls the association of the output array as well as which arrays are defined as variables.

StringVectorProperty.name: ArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the output array.

IntVectorProperty.name: CopyArrays
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to true, all the cell and point arrays from first input are copied to the output.

SourceProxy.name: ProgrammableFilter
SourceProxy.label: Programmable Filter

Documentation.long_help: Executes a user supplied python script on its input dataset to produce an output dataset.
Documentation.short_help: Executes a python script to produce data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter will execute a python script to produce an output dataset. The filter keeps a copy of the python script in Script, and creates Interpretor, a python interpretor to run the script upon the first execution.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input(s) to the programmable filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable filter runs.

StringVectorProperty.name: InformationScript
StringVectorProperty.label: RequestInformation Script
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property is a python script that is executed during the RequestInformation pipeline pass. Use this to provide information such as WHOLE_EXTENT to the pipeline downstream.

IntVectorProperty.name: CopyArrays
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to true, all the cell and point arrays from first input are copied to the output.

StringVectorProperty.name: PythonPath
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: A semi-colon (;) separated list of directories to add to the python library search path.

SourceProxy.name: ProgrammableSource
SourceProxy.label: Programmable Source

Documentation.long_help: Executes a user supplied python script to produce an output dataset.
Documentation.short_help: Executes a python script to produce data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This source will execute a python script to produce an output dataset. The source keeps a copy of the python script in Script, and creates Interpretor, a python interpretor to run the script upon the first execution.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable source.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.

StringVectorProperty.name: InformationScript
StringVectorProperty.label: Script (RequestInformation)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property is a python script that is executed during the RequestInformation pipeline pass. Use this to provide information such as WHOLE_EXTENT to the pipeline downstream.

StringVectorProperty.name: PythonPath
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: A semi-colon (;) separated list of directories to add to the python library search path.
